name: anytype-ts-bindings
description: protobuf TS bindings for Anytype middleware library

scripts.build:ts: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o build/ts/commands.js ./pb/protos/*.proto ./pb/protos/service/*.proto /service/*.proto ./vendor/github.com/anytypeio/go-anytype-library/pb/model/protos/*.proto && ./node_modules/.bin/pbts -o build/ts/commands.d.ts build/ts/commands.js ./vendor/github.com/anytypeio/go-anytype-library/pb/model/protos/*.proto
scripts.build:js: go mod download && make protos && make build-lib && make build-js && npm run build:ts && cp -rf ./jsaddon/build ../anytype/build && cp ./build/ts/commands.js ../anytype/electron/proto
